abstract: Russia will make bid to host Rugby World Cup in 2023.
snippet: Russia, which made its Rugby World Cup debut last month, plans to bid for the event in 2023.
lead_paragraph: Russia, which made its Rugby World Cup debut last month, plans to bid for the event in 2023.

headline.main: Russia to Bid for 2023 World Cup
headline.print_headline: Russia to Bid for 2023 World Cup
headline.seo: Russia to Bid for 2023 Rugby World Cup
